channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: Written Assignments You should use standard business formats, and please proofread as spelling, grammar, and punctuation will figure into your grade. Memos Baseline Self-Evaluation (PDF) Final Self-Evaluation (PDF) Meeting Maker Case (PDF) Problem Sets Problem Set 1: Clear, Concise Writing in E-Mail (PDF) Problem Set 2: Should MacGregor Dining Be Re-Opened? (PDF) Problem Set 3: Mid-Semester Self-Evaluation (PDF) Problem Set 4 & 5: Analysis of Individual Behavior and Team Dynamics (PDF) Other Cover Letter (PDF) Team Report (PDF) Oral Presentations You will give five different types of presentations of varying lengths during the term.
